body:
A security incident is any action or event that breaks MoJ security policies and controls, including:

- loss or compromise of personal data
- loss or theft of laptop or mobile
- a key cabinet being left unsecured â€“ even though there is no evidence of loss of assets
- unusual or unexpected people, vehicles or packages outside MoJ buildings
- someone tailgating you through an office door or barrier
unauthorised access to IT systems or documents
- lost building security passes
heading: Report a security incident or breach
lede: Use this form to report incidents that might cause harm or loss to people, property or information.
